metadata.name: Setuid and Setgid
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious change of file privileges with chown and chmod commands

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('5') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('chown root')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' chmod u+s')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' chmod g+s'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious change of file privileges with chown and chmod commands

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administration activities References: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1548.001/T1548.001.md, https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1548/001/
